description.S1: Now that you've collected Cod Maybell's finger,
description.S2: you can turn it in to Constable Reyes in Edgewater to collect the bounty.

description.S1: Now that you've collected Bertie Cotton's finger,
description.S2: you can turn it in to Constable Reyes in Edgewater to collect the bounty.

description.S1: Now that you've collected Guillaume Antrim's finger,
description.S2: you can turn it in to Constable Reyes in Edgewater to collect the bounty.

blurb.B1: After the final bounty has been turned in to Constable Reyes,
blurb.B2: she will take the liberty of deputizing the Stranger and presenting them with a junior deputy constable's badge.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Something to report?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm here to turn in a bounty.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: How did so many of your people end up marauders?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I've got some questions for you, if you don't mind.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Goodbye.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: We pay by the finger. What do you have for me?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Hand over Guillaume Antrim's finger.>

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Hand over Doc Maybell's finger.>

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Hand over Bertie Cotton's finger.>

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Actually, there was something else.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Gill Antrim. Real name Guillaume. Duly processed by a freelancer on behalf of Spacer's Choice.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: I remember him. Was just a kid, last I saw him. Shame.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Well, that's all three. I must remember to requisition some more fingerprint ink. Here's all the compensation you've earned, plus a bonus.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Still one outstanding bounty. If you've got a finger, I've got the paperwork.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'll just need your signature here, here, here, here, and here. Got any more fingers for me?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What's this? Junior Deputy Constable?

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: You've done such a bang up job hunting down our former workers that I thought it only proper to deputize you. Congratulations.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Maybell Burgess. Age thirty-seven. Right or left handed? Let's just say... no longer applicable.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: I remember Doc Burgess. Conducted my physical every fiscal quarter. Guess she couldn't keep her hands off her patients' medicine.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Here we are. Bertie Cotton. Cause of death - let's just say overwhelming physical trauma.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Bert was the local preacher, before Max took over. Always was quick to remind us that we all get what we deserve in the end.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Let me stop you there. It is official Spacer's Choice policy that all marauders, regardless of prior affiliation to the Spacer's Choice brand, no longer qualify as "our people."

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That doesn't really answer my question.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Sounds like marauders have been a problem for a while.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: All right. Forget I asked.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Marauders are folk who lost the will to keep working. Wandered out into the wilds and gave in to their baser instincts.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Not everybody's cut out to work in Edgewater. Some turn deserter. Some turn marauder. None of 'em get my sympathy.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Marauders seem to like Adrena-Time.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: There was something else I wanted to ask you.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That's all for now.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Everybody likes Adrena-Time. It is the finest medical drug ever developed by Spacer's Choice. Much better than that crap Auntie Cleo peddles.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Sure, a little too much Adrena-Time can bring out the violent animal in you. But if overdosing on Adrena-Time turns you into a lunatic, you have only yourself to blame.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Says so right on the warning label. Violent psychosis is a well-documented and legally accounted-for side effect of Adrena-Time.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: What's on your mind?

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Ever since the company first settled the Vale. Life's good out here, but it ain't easy. Some folk can't keep pace with the demands of frontier life.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Something else I can do for you?

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: As long as your questions fall within acceptable margins of curiosity.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: So who do you work for? Spacer's Choice or Edgewater?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Never mind.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: If this is the setup to a joke, you should know I've never found anything amusing in my life.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: I don't serve Edgewater. Edgewater, and the entire region of Emerald Vale, serves Spacer's Choice.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Who does Spacer's Choice answer to?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That sounds like slavery.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: So you're basically a bureaucrat.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Thanks for your time.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Spacer's Choice is a wholly owned subsidiary of Universal Defense Logistics, which occupies a seat on the Halcyon Holdings Corporation.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Also known as the Board. I must admit, it bothers me that you don't already know this.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: There was one other thing.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Careful, stranger. Talk like that comes dangerously close to sedition.

dialog.speaker: ConstableReyes (Female)
dialog.utterance: Flattery won't get you anywhere with me. The bureaucracy is a noble profession, but not all of us are gifted enough to serve in it.
